thread.title: Yo, It's Time We Had A Serious Talk About "Suavemente"
thread.title_full: Yo, It's Time We Had A Serious Talk About "Suavemente"

author: Norberto Briceño
title: Yo, It's Time We Had A Serious Talk About "Suavemente"
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @Linaalf1 ID: 10323222 2. …this song would infiltrate the sound waves with it’s catchy merengue beat. View this image ›
Twitter: @purefIoyd ID: 10323223 3. It was the GO TO song that pulled your 50-year-old tía and your stuck-up primos onto the dance floor. View this image ›
Twitter: @SammyTellem ID: 10323236 4. It was the heartbeat of every family gathering. View this image ›
Twitter: @adriannastyIes ID: 10323246 5. It was the song that brought you to life… View this image ›
Twitter: @_shxrxn ID: 10323495 6. …and will always have a special place in your heart. View this image ›
Twitter: @SammyTellem ID: 10323277 7. BUT there’s another group of people who want this song to be locked in a box and thrown overboard into the depths of the Carribean Sea. View this image ›
Twitter: @Mr_Lou__ ID: 10323517 8. Those who get a chill down their spine at the sound of Elvis Crespo’s orgasmic voice. View this image ›
Twitter: @belestee ID: 10323184 9. There are those who take joy in denying us “BESAME! BESAME!” View this image ›
Twitter: @belestee ID: 10323389 10. Some think that we’ve had enough “Suavemente” for one lifetime. View this image ›
Twitter: @itsdannykids ID: 10323198 11. And just want DJs around the globe to kindly stop playing this merengue masterpiece. View this image ›
Twitter: @skribble197 ID: 10323321 12. And to be fair, they kinda have a point. The song is super played out, dangerously bordering “Caballo Dorado”/ “Macarena” levels. But having said that… View this image ›
Twitter: @DaisyJaqui ID: 10324027 13. …it’s really hard not to rip up the dance floor when it comes on. View this image ›
Via Twitter: @wearemitu ID: 10324034 So, what do you think about "Suavemente"? This song will NEVER get old. “SUAVEMENT …BE-SA-ME!” This song is overplayed, overrated, and there’s better merengue songs out there.
